website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced model with a spacious interior that quickly and thoroughly dries your clothes.
pros: This dryer features 8 dry modes with multiple options and temperature settings to meet your needs
Accurately detects when your clothes are dry and plays a pleasant melody
The wrinkle guard feature works well, and the bright display is easy to read
cons: A few customers received models that stopped working after a few years

customer_reviews.text: We have used this dryer for about 2 months now and are quite happy thus far.

customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, my wife loves this dryer, no shaking, no rattling like the other GEs
customer_reviews.author: Nic Coplin

customer_reviews.title: Samsung has a faulty fan relay issue over multiple years and models
customer_reviews.text: Search YouTube for Samsung issues before you buy. Have a screw driver ready to bandage issues weekly... Our dryer is 1.5 years old and out of warranty with similar issues to many others. Samsung does not admit to knowledge of a systemic issue with fan relay quality and wants a service payment up front plus hourly rate and parts to come diagnose a faulty control board that just needs to be tapped on to get the relay to re-set. Very upsetting to have a manufacture continually sell faulty products and not stand behind their brand.
customer_reviews.author: petesmart

customer_reviews.title: I love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for 3 years and it is awesome. I never had an electric dryer before this one, but I bought a home that did not have gas available. It is wonderful, I just bout another for my daughter and she loves it, my son needs a dryer as well and looking to buy him one. I have never had any issues with it. I have the matching washer and loads are done so quick. I am sorry people have been having issues with theirs but I absolutely love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Petz

customer_reviews.title: Absolute piece of garbage..
customer_reviews.text: Absolute piece of garbage...mine is less than a year old and I have the same issues another reviewer has. I use a clothes rack to dry the towels most of them time....I have to turn the thing back on at least three times...I have just had a load on the max settings for an hour and a half and the towels are still wet. Not a clog or anything...just a piece of junk. Do Not buy this thing. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: getreal

customer_reviews.title: Dryer will quit heating within 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer for just over a year so it’s not covered under warranty. It will not heat anymore. From the research I’ve done, it will continue to break even after fixing it. Search the model number and you’ll see the problems that owners are having. This purchase was a regrettable mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Schmizzly Lair

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dryer less then 4 years ago, threw the belt 2 years ago, now it threw the belt again due to a melted tensioner pulley, they do not use a bearing in the pulley but instead a metal bushing on metal shaft, this is just designed to fail, very upset at how cheap the internals are on this machine, definitely would not buy it again now I’m stuck fixing it
customer_reviews.author: Etarby

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: samsung does not know how to make dryers! I have dealt with 2 different dryers and have had many problems with both after only a year of service!
customer_reviews.author: Julius White

customer_reviews.title: Wont heat over 13-16 months
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on samsungs help forum. Will not last but about 13 months and quit drying. Samsung will not address the issue

customer_reviews.title: What a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer because I have had such good luck with our TV and refrigerator. This dryer is 13 months old, one month out of warranty, and it has gone belly up. It will cost me half of what I paid for it to have it repaired. I may just purchase a new dryer but it won't be a Samsung.
